dmca.title: [TP-C213038R] Website issues
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]

Conversation: [TP-C213038R] Website issues

The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

of us.army.mil does not designate 70.87.6.110 as permitted sender)
client-ip=70.87.6.110; envelope-from=cara.lammey@us.army.mil;
helo=smtp01.theplanet.com; 

MIME element (text/plain)
To whom it may concern, 
     While on the internet the other day I found a link that mentioned
my name (I have a rare name) and the word nude.  I clicked on it and was
taken to a site that had, all the way at the bottom of the page, a link
that said my name and then the word nude.  It was a link to a movie site
called www.moviereality.com.  The movie would not load (Thank God).  My
point of writing is that whoever is posting this site which features
information about me did it without my knowledge and certainly without
my consent.  My legal counsel has advised me to request that the site be
turned off.   
     Even if this is not enough reason, the site itself has many other
links to this same site, which upon trying to open the links my security
system advised me of the prescence of  Trojan Horse in the software.  So
it seems that the site should be shut down even wihout reference to
myself as it could endanger other customers of yours. 
 
I guess I didn't explain yet that I tracerouted the site back to you
guys so I believe you may be the host server for the site. 
The site is
nude.jhyujik.org/cara-lammey-nude.html
All of the other sites on this domain name contain the same virus laden
links. 
 
Thank you for your time and I would appreciate if this could be turned
off.  
Thanks,
Cara Lammey
